column4: Hi folks, i've installed ubuntu server at my home PC, and after installing an xfce on it i am using it as my desktop computer ( yeah, i know ). The mic is not working ( tho sound is ) anyone can venture a guess at what i need to install in order for it to work?
I was about to try that as well. Did you configure sound server on your computer?
pulseaudio? i've just figured that out, i'm installing it now
